item.description:
Hello All,

There had been a mixup with the reservation I made at Brazi's last Thursday night and they cannot accommodate us tomorrow night. I should have confirmed the reservation sooner I guess. My sincere apologies for the mixup. I've changed the reservation to Tony and Lucilles on Wooster Street at 7:30.
Please email me so I know everyone knows the new location or you can call me at 203-215-8070. We seem to have nice crowd for this event and I hope everyone can still make it. Tony & Lucille's is also a very good Italian restaurant. They also have their own parking lot. Looking forward to meeting all of you.
Cheers,
Kathy

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: The New Haven Dining Out November Meetup
